name: claudedesk
description: A minimal Electron desktop application wrapping Claude Code CLI

scripts.postinstall:
node -e "console.log('
⚠️  ClaudeDesk is a desktop application.

You've installed the SOURCE CODE. To get the INSTALLABLE APP:
→ https://github.com/carloluisito/claudedesk/releases

To build from source: npm run package
')"
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run build:electron && electron .
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run build:electron && electron-builder
